elements.name: panel1
elements.title: What are your strengths and weaknesses as a logistician?

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Is this question admissible or inadmissible?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: If inadmissible: Justification?

elements.name: question11
elements.title: If inadmissible: Proposal for an appropriate response

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Do you tend to be on the left or right politically?

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Is this question admissible or inadmissible?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: If inadmissible: Justification?
elements.correctAnswer: This question has no relation to the work to be done.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: If inadmissible: Proposal for an appropriate response
elements.correctAnswer: I am rather apolitical. I prefer to get involved in/as ...

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Have you ever smoked pot in your life?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Is this question admissible or inadmissible?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: If inadmissible: Justification?
elements.correctAnswer: One-time smoking does not reduce current work performance = no relation to the work to be done.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: If inadmissible: Proposal for an appropriate response
elements.correctAnswer: No, it's not my thing! Or: I tried it once as a 16-year-old - it made me sick.

elements.name: panel4
elements.title: How often have you been ill in the past year?

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Is this question admissible or inadmissible?

elements.name: question9
elements.title: If inadmissible: Justification?
elements.correctAnswer: Only illnesses that make it permanently impossible or difficult to perform the work in question must be reported. This question is not aimed at this.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: If inadmissible: Proposal for an appropriate response

elements.name: panel5
elements.title: How many accidents resulting in damage have you caused as a logistics specialist in the last five years?

elements.title: Is this question admissible or inadmissible?

elements.name: question13
elements.title: If inadmissible: Justification?

elements.name: question14
elements.title: If inadmissible: Proposal for an appropriate response

elements.title: Assumption: A colleague in your team is being bullied. How would you react?
